title: unnai ninaindu (varNam)
sahitya:
unnait-tudikka aruL tA innishaiyuDan unnai tudikka aruL tA


anupallavi

  ponnaith tudittu maDap-pUvaiyaraiyum tudittu
 cinnattanam aDaindhu cittamum kalangiDAmal


caraNam    ponnATTinum shiranda puNNiyak-kamalAlaya nannATTinil viLangi
 naNNumajapA naTanat-tannATTiyat-tiratthil nATTamoDu vATTamara
 shonnATTArUr tOzhanE sundara tyaagEshanE (un)
